articles.author: Tata Institute of Fundamental Research
articles.title: Alaknanda: JWST discovers massive grand-design spiral galaxy from the universe's infancy - Phys.org
articles.description: A spiral galaxy, shaped much like our Milky Way, has been found in an era when astronomers believed such well-formed galaxies could not yet exist. Two astronomers from India have identified a remarkably mature galaxy just 1.5 billion years after the Big Bang—…
